title: Dried prawns fried rice
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons cooking oil', '1 tablespoon dried prawns (do not wash)', '2 shallots, finely sliced', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '100g fresh small prawns', '100g green beans, cut into cubes', '1 medium carrot, cut into 5mm cubes', '2 tablespoons light soy sauce', '1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '4 small eggs', 'salt and white pepper to taste', '1kg cooked rice, preferably chilled overnight', '2 spring onions, chopped']
